comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
なんのコメントも無いんですが(^^;

この曲、思いつきで弾いていたらいつの間にか出来ていました。

きっと妖精さんのしわざに違いない。きっとそうだ。

妖精が襲ってくるー。というわけで Fairy Dance
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
I've nothing to say about this one (^^;

It was a song that I just thought up one day on the spot.

I'm sure it's a fairy's doing. I'm pretty sure.

Ahh, the fairies are invading, is what I thought of, so it's called Fairy Dance

name.jp: 天鵞絨少女戦 ~ Velvet Battle

comments.jp:
VIVITのテーマです。
メイドさんといえば、世間では日光に弱い眼鏡っ娘と相場が決まってますが、
今回は私のメイドさんイメージで曲を創りました。というかいつも・・・
なんて言うか、東洋風じゃないことだけは確かかと(^^;

(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
「びろおどしょうじょせん」と読みませう。ええ、そうしませう。

曲は曲名と一切関係なく(ぉ、フュージョンをっぽいところも

あります。

完全に趣味ですね(笑)
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
It reads "Birōdo shoujo sen". Yeah, like that.

The song itself has nothing to do with the title (kind of like a fusion music too)

After all, its merit is in its completion (laughs)

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
前作(秋霜玉)のゲイツの曲は、「天空アーミー」でしたので、今回

は「天空城」です。(ですって言い切られてもなぁ)

キャラ的に全然合っていないところがポイント。

この曲も、思いつくがままに、お酒に飲まれるがままに、弾いてい

たら出来ていた、って曲だったなぁ(^^:

それじゃ、キャラにあわんわな。
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
Gates' theme song from the earlier game (Shuusou Gyoku) was "Firmament Army", so

his theme song for this game is "Castle Explorer" (Or should I say... Sort of?)

Major point about this song is that it does not feel like his theme song at all.

I worked on this song whenever it came to my mind, whenever I enjoyed some beer, and

got to complete it soon (^^:

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
この曲は夏バージョンに比べて、大幅にお洒落になったと思う。

Pseudoclassicとは、擬古的なということです。チェンバロなんか使って

るけどサビなどJazzyな部分もあるのでそうしました。

擬古的というのをギコ的と表記すると、かなり嫌(^^;。

オルフェというのはオルフェウスの事です。曲とは関係ありません(ぉ
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
Compared to the one I released during summer, I think this one is less serious.

Pseudoclassic means imitating old traditions. The Cembalo is used in this song

to give it a somewhat old and Jazzy feeling.

I'm in preference of writing "ギコ的" over "擬古的". (^^;。

Orphic refers to anything that pertains to Orpheus. It has nothing to do with

the song (Oh).

comments.jp:
ミリアのテーマ

この曲が一番昔に創った曲です。ちょうど1年前位に。

ほとんどがピアノで構成されてる曲、の割には、ピアノらしからぬノリなところがポイント(じゃない)
comments.en:
Milia's theme.

This is the oldest song I made. About a year ago. 

The point of this song (or not) is that, most of the song's on piano, and yet there are parts that don't feel like that at all.

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
この曲が一番古い曲です。今年の1月に創りました。

まだ、ゲームのゲの字も無かった頃ですね(^^;

ちょうど新世紀がセンセーショナルだったので、こんな曲名。

いや、そんなに大げさな曲じゃないんだけど(笑)
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
This is the oldest song from here. I made it in January this year.

That's pretty much when I didn't even know the G of Game (^^;

Since the new millennium seems to be the sensation nowadays, I went for this song title.

Well, this song is nothing as grandiose as such (laughs).

comments.jp:
マリーのテーマ

一番ミスマッチかと思ってたけど、割とキャラにあった曲になったみたい。

重厚そうで実はものすごく軽快なリズムの曲です。

何とも言えない雰囲気が漂ってるなぁ(^^;
comments.en:
Marie's theme. 

I thought this song would be the biggest mismatch, but it looks like it ended up matching the character.
It sounds heavy, and yet the rhythm runs light and smooth.

There's a really hard to explain sort of feel in this song (^^;

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
この曲が結果的に一番キャラに合ったのかも知れない。

midi 版はともかく、wav 版はロマンティックな曲になっています。

うそ、なっていません。

曲名の聖騎士とは、言うまでもなくジャンヌ・ダルクのことです。

「フラッシュソード!」とかいう、足癖の悪い女王様です。
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
I'm guessing this song is the most successful in embodying the character.

Regardless of the midi version, the wav version sounds romantic.

Just kidding, not really.

The holy knight in the song title is, needless to say, Joan of Arc.

She's one wicked highness, who goes well with the catchphrase "Flash sword!"

comments.jp:
エーリッヒのテーマ

あっはっは~、これは凄いね(笑)

老人のイメージで創りたかったんだけど、老人どころか、どっちかつーと読書好きな

大人しい少女ですね。そもそもSTGの曲ではないな(^^;
comments.en:
Erich's theme.

Hahaha, now isn't this amazing (lol)

I wanted to make this to an old man's image, but it became a gentle book-loving girl's song.

In the first place, it doesn't sound like a song for a STG (^^;

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
私の女中、甘い女中よ。

メイドって甘いのでしょうか。炊事洗濯、水仕事ばっかであんまり

おいしくないんだろうなぁ。残念。

狂牛病も草食を無理矢理肉食に変えたせいだって言うから、私も気を

付けないと。(なんの話だ?)
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
My maid, sweet maid indeed.

I wonder if maids are indeed sweet. Well, probably not that tasty since all they do is

clean and wash clothes. Too bad.

Since they say the mad cow disease started from forcing carnivorous diets on vegetarians

I'll need a change of mood (What the heck?)

name.jp: 桜花之恋塚 ~ Flower of Japan
name.en: Lovely Mound of Cherry Blossoms ~ Flower of Japan

comments.jp:
幽香のテーマ

和風でござる。やっぱ一作品に一曲は無いと寂しい東洋曲(笑)

私にしてはものすごく珍しく(いやほんとに)明るくて楽しい曲です。

なんともお洒落(か?)
comments.en:
Yuuka's theme.

It's Japanese style. It'd be lonely to have a game without an Asian sort of song. (laughs)

It's a light and fun song, which is very rare for me (no, really).

It's quite fashionable (really?).

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
「おうかのこいづか」と読みます。純和風ですよ、いや、準和風かな?

どのみち、私は東方某を謳っていたくせに、創った東方曲は実は数が少なかっ

たりして貴重です。

そもそも、軽快な雰囲気の曲も珍しい。New Age 寄りな一曲。
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
It reads "Ouka no Koizuka". It's original Japanese. No, semi-Japanese, maybe?

Well, I wanted to make a Touhou-like song. They're quite precious to me.

To begin with, it's unusual for me to make such a light-hearted song. It's a New Age approach.

name.jp: 乙女戦士 ~ Heart of Valkyrie

comments.jp:
モーガンのテーマ

ようやくボスらしい曲に。今回の曲の中でもっとも私らしい曲かも知れませんね。

曲名で分かるように(分かりません)、何かイメージわかないかなぁと思いつつ、

某ヴァルキリープロファイルの攻略本見ながら弾きました(^^;
comments.en:
Morgan's theme.

Finally, a song that fits a boss battle.

It might be the most me-ish song this time.

As you can see from the title (nope), I played this song while I was flipping through a strategy guide for Valkyrie Profile since I was lost for an image for the song.(^^;

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
乙女戦士はヴァルキリーです。お得意の一曲で、もっとも私らしい曲です。

って、こんな曲をお得意としているのもなんだな(^^;

これを聴くとFM時代からなんにも変わっていない自分に気づきます。

やっぱボス戦大好き(笑)

対戦STGという性質上、ボス戦が少ないからなぁ。
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
By warrior maiden, I'm referring to the Valkyrie. It's one of the best songs I made

and it certainly feels like me... Err wait, did I just say best song? (^^;

I feel like I haven't changed that much since the FM era when I'm listening to this.

I just like boss fights (lol)

Just because characteristically fighting STGs lack boss fights.

name.jp: エニグマティクドール ~ God Knows

comments.jp:
ミューズのテーマ

ラスボスらしい曲になった、かどうかは分からないですが、ずいぶんお洒落な雰囲気のラスボス曲です(^^;
comments.en:
Muse's theme.

I don't know if it sounds like a last boss song, but it's a last boss song that sounds quite trendy.

comments.jp:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
ラスボスっぽいっかつーと、76%位ラスボスな感じ。

ピアノアドリブが大好き。でも、この曲のサビは今までの私の曲では珍しい

メロディかも知れない。

ここで言う「エニグマティクドール」とは、直訳すると不思議の人形、

まぁ、呪術人形のつもりで。
comments.en:
(Composition of Fantasy ~ Alice in Shanghai Land)
A piece just like that for a boss fight--or should I say, about 76% of the boss fight.

I like the improvisation on the piano part. However, you rarely see any faults of 

this song in any other songs composed by me.

Probably it's just the melody.

The "Enigmatic Doll" here is, literally, a weird doll.

Probably a magical doll.
